metadata.title: CVE-2023-47995 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in BitmapAccess.cpp::FreeImage_AllocateBitmapin FreeImage 3.18.0 allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: freeimage: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
